caption: We met with friends at this spot for a meeting. This spot was recommended to us by a friend.  Well, we were not disappointed. the staff members were so friendly and we felt good. The food was just great. We enjoyed every moment and we shall absolutely come back again. Highly recommended.

Came here with my wife on our anniversary.  The waiter treated us like royalty.  Each dish was carefully and thoroughly explained.  The atmosphere was very classy...my wife kept stating how everything looked so nice & fancy.  Will be back again!
Excellent food
Great menu. Wonderful ambience.
Unbelievable food. So fresh.

We had a table for Valentine’s Day. Just wanted to take a moment to compliment the service we received from Sal.The restaurant was a little busy and very short in staff.I appreciate a server who does a great job, and he handled our table with humor and professionalism with a perfect display of relaxed competence. Well done Sal and the Pearl Room.We’ll be back!
Good food
Great place Great Service 👍

I had great intentions of celebrating a close friend's Birthday at The Pearl Room this past weekend. Three of us ordered the Shell Steak Dinner.  We were informed by the waiter, all the steaks are cooked medium.  and he specified NOT Med Rare....Medium.  I found  this very strange, not wanting to be picky, I said ok  The steaks  were not seared on either  side, they looked very weird...like a beige color with two little grill marks  there.  One of my friends couldn't even eat hers, she felt it was not fresh...we come to find out they were  probably precooked when shipped   that's probably why they could only be cooked  Medium.  The guest of honor was served short ribs. She ordered Prime Rib! Service was close to a zero. Once the water took our food order, he never come back to our table. We had to  keep asking the Bus boys when we can catch them for the essentials such as Steak Knives, salt and pepper. water, Later on, we were told he was handling a big party in a private room..ahhh i see, so the hell with us. They did take the one steak dinner off the bill. they didn't even offer to adjust the bill for the inconveniences. I brought the check to Maryann paid cash munis a tip. i explained  why no tip and she wasn't surprised at all....I then handed her $20.00, this is for the bus boys  who took care of us. My friend's Birthday was ruined. but we took the Birthday Cake we brought there and havd desert and coffee at my place .  The food was not what we expected from this place  at all. The service was horrific. THE ONE STAR IS FOR THE BUS BOY'S  TOOT A LOO PEARL ROOM
Great food period
Great Food, Drinks, Service, atmosphere.
Service was great. The food, subpar.

We had a private party with ten people, and had a private room. Everything was okay, but the guy who was our host  (maitre d'?) was pretty rude, and made absolutely no attempt to try and hide his annoyance at various things. I know it's not an easy job, but we really weren't being difficult, and besides, don't work in hospitality if you can't at least fake being nice.

My Daughter had her Wedding Ceremony here. NO STRESS, ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL!!! They did it all to make her Night BEAUTIFUL!!! Great food, Great drinks, great Bartender, Great Staff And BEAUTIFUL Owner.. EXCEPTIONAL PLACE!!!
The owners here are so cool, down to earth and very welcoming...I haven't had their food, but attended an award ceremony for an old time friend.  It was awesome.

Took my wife here for her birthday. The food was delicious, and the service was excellent. I told her she needs to bring me back here for my birthday next month. We both had the scallops, which were perfectly prepared. Everything was fresh and delicious.

One of the best restaurants in New York. Service is fast and attentive. The place is lovely with a beautiful skylight in back. The food is fantastic -- everything from delicious pasta to a savory turkey dinner on Thanksgiving. Owner is friendly and easy to talk with. A wonderful experience!
Food was good, service ok, dirty bathrooms
The food was great. Server Javier was great! Definitely would go back.
Delicious food and great service. We ordered chilan sea bass and salmon, it was so tasty and juicy, tuna for appetizer was great..Highly recommend
Great food.

Can be hit or miss.  Some food is excellent,  some dried out. They're often playing bad disco and 80's & 90's dance music very loudly.  Drinks are good, servers and bartender are nice and pretty attentive. I noticed a pink rim around the toilet water,  kinda yucky.

Started bad when they said they had no clams or mussels available, amongst some other items on the menu. The Pinot grigio tasted like vinegar. The fried Calamari was terrible and the sauce was inedible. Lobster cocktail, coconut shrimp and the oysters were good, but very cheap on the portion size. Striped Bass was absolutely inedible. It was so bad I had to spit it out. It wasn’t bad fish, it was just way overcooked with a horrible taste.  The Chilean Sea Bass on the other hand was delicious. The vegetable risotto was tasty, but not cooked correctly. Was more like veggies and rice. Overall very bad experience. To top it off my bill was $158 and some change. I gave $200 and the change given back was $40. I understand it’s a dollar and change, but who does that? That two dollars was deducted from the already poor service tip. Place is not the same.
Food was excellent.  Especially rhe pot of mussels in the lobster sauce.  The waiter Javier was so pleasant.  He treated us like family. Wish there was more people for Disco night.
Great restaurant! The food is always great and customer service is always on point. Its a bay ridge icon since its earlier days on 83rd  street
Wonderful atmosphere, delicious fresh seafood.

Had a baby shower here in their private room. That room is perfect for a small private event of about 20 ppl. We were able to decorate the place before the event started and staff was really friendly and accommodating during entire process. They had a brunch party menu and food was delish. Service was very good and staff was accommodating. Owner was very fair and reasonable when it came time for the bill. Overall, a very good experience.
Nice ambiance...Manager is very socialable & friendly.
Great food & great for having a party .
Good food great service and owner is awesome
Excellent food and service...Highly recommended!
Nice restaurant but way over priced.
Love the music and ambiance
Great atmosphere..Great food..
Great food.
The best place to eat am high off the grate taste  thank you the frozen drink guy
My experience here was fantastic service was fabulous and the owner was very attentive.
Good food
It was a nice place to go
Great food
One of the best send food restaurant in NYC. People and the service  here is so nice and friendly food is awesome. Cheers to Sigrid and Christian. Do try hot seafood combo amazing.

I have been to this restaurant several times and each experience absolutely wonderful..!!..ANTHONY the owner is just fantastic and does a great job with the presentation of the food —it taste as great as it looks..!!.. Ziggy one of his management staff is just as great and the sweetest  personality... Can’t wait to go back..
(Translated by Google) Good place  (Original) Buen lugar
Great food and free style!
Great place with excellent food & service. Wonderful menu. Manger is fantastic. It's a 10 star restaurant.
Space was nice food wasnt so good.
Decent spot but food took too long
The service and food were amazing.  Ziggy is the best waitress around. Truffle purses are to die. We always go afterwork and we are never disappointed!
Food was very good. Large portions reasonably priced.

This place was perfect for a last minute gathering. The staff was great,  the hostess Viggie was awesome, nice atmosphere,  and menu selections was great. I had a party of 34 so  there were mixed reviews about food,  however,  we had a menu option and I'm sure if we ordered straight from the menu there would have been a different take on food review.  But everything else was excellent.  I will definitely go back the next time I'm in NYC.
Very elegant.  I lwas ook for a space to keep a function unfortunately the party room was too small and other space was to big. So I was not able to book the space . The menu had plenty of choices

We have been going here for years and have had many parties.  Staff is always friendly and attentive.  Vlada and Victor are the best bartenders, very friendly and welcoming.  The owner is kind and treats everyone like family. Last and mist importantly the food is always delicious and fresh,  some of my favorites are the empanadas, lamb chops, and best penne with vodka sauce.

My husband and I just left that restaurant we were so looking forward to having dinner in this restaurant. We got seated and the waitress came ten minutes later took our order. 15 minutes later they bring out the drinks. Then we wait 35 minutes and they still haven’t even bought out the appetizers. I tell the waitress we still haven’t gotten anything she said ok hun it will be out it’s almost out. I said ok waited another 15 min. Then I asked someone else I told him we still haven’t even gotten our appetizers and we been here for 45 min. He was shocked. And went to see what was going on. He comes back and says ok what would you like? My husband and I said we already ordered he said can you tell me again? We said no we been here for an hour and haven’t gotten anything . As we got up and walking out the same waitress “manager” says please don’t leave. We explained how long we have been sitting waiting for our food. And she says because we make everything fresh. My husband then tells her it doesn’t take that long to bring out appetizers. She says oh you ordered appetizers? She goes oh no I forgot. We then just walked out. It’s a pretty place but service is a big fat NO.!  (Mind you the restaurant was not even busy)
Great service and the food was delicious

Mixed review.  Looks nice. DJ music was fun.  Not sure what was going on in the kitchen and with the serving staff.  They did not seem experienced. We were basically the only people in the dining room for the most part. Party of 16.   And still, we had keep asking for basic things like water, salt, pepper.   Utensils. Food came out all different times.  Staff kept reaching over us to hand food to  people  on the other side of the table.  Couple of dishes had to be returned. Errors in the bill.   Pleasant staff , I think they just need some proper training.  Maybe watch those shows in TV that help restaurants.

The  Pearl Room is a bar and restaurant on the nearly famous 3rd Ave. in Bay Ridge Brooklyn. The owner is a standup guy, and runs the business well. The program has been in business longer than I have been in Bay Village. The waitstaff is friendly, experienced (and attractive, I might add). they have a happy hour I believe it's from four to six every evening or five to seven nightly.
My daughter had her wedding reception at the Pearl room. The food was fabulous, and the service was superb. It was a fantastic party thanks to Ziggy and wonderful chef's at he Pearl Room.
Came here for a work- related event and the food was exceptional.
Excellent service but the food could have been  better
Nice place

We had a baby shower here. It was small and intimate I must say the food was completely amazing. We had no complaints at all. We decorated how we wanted too. The manager always asked if everything was okay and even checked on us occasionally. This is a great place to hold an event

One of the best Italian restaurants in Brooklyn New York, I had a shower and I must say every guest of the party including myself stated the food was great, delicious and the service very on point, Thank you again
Nice place
This place is the Best all the food and the everything was excellent they made my son's wedding A Night to Remember thank you so much
Awsome place all around👍

I had the pleasure of hosting and attending a baby shower at Pearl Room. The whole experience was great! Ziggy was very welcoming and made sure our party was a success. The food was plentiful and delicious. Our guests left very happy with their bellies full ;) Thank you Pearl Room!

Came here tonight for dinner with friends. The food is incredible and the portions are generous! Really nice restaurant with a tremendous causal dining experience. Would come again. Our server Ziggy was incredible and really nice! Im so glad we came here. Thanks pearl room staff!

Just had an amazing experience tonight at The Pearl Room. From delicious appetizers like the bacon wrapped shrimp and calamari, entrees consisting of Sea Bass, Chicken wrapped in Bacon w/ maple potatoes, and then ending the night with some coffee and truffles. Not only that but everyone here is so kind, friendly, and makes you feel so welcome. Huge thank you to our waitress Ziggy who made the night very entertaining, and helped us with suggestions. If youre ever in Bay Ridge, please check this place out!
Great hostess!!! Food was fantastic!!!
Very nice!
Hostess was wonderful service excellent and food amazing
Great food, classy environment for dinner or just drinks. Awesome staff!
Delicious food
Great food
Definitely a place to go! Good food, music, and people!!!
Nice staff, very nice atmosphere, parking a problem

I've been going 2 the Pearl Room over 15 yrs, they've moved 3 times and it's just not what it once was...menu selections have been cut back, still very good...less glam, still good, not the Pearl Room of the past though...
Great food.
Extremely Slow service.

Atmosphere it’s ok . Kitchen terrible . Food for pigs . Meat thawed in the microwave. They do not even know what is that mean stake meat . Restroom is clean .  Servis is great 5 star . Valet parking also great . Restoran cant mix fish & meat together. Portion are huge . Never again . Money to trush & waist my time .

Nice place, we had a new waiter! I think it was his first night! He wasn't the sharpest tool in the box. But he really tried hard. Food was good. Atmosphere was alright I guess. It was the birthday celebration of my significant other. All in all we all had a nice time.

I had my son’s Baptism at the Pearl Room. The food was delicious and only matched by the service and ambiance.  The event coordinator Ziggy was a pleasure to work with. She was so sweet and attentive and really worked at making our party a beautiful experience. I would recommend this restaurant to anyone looking to have a party! I also recommend that you try the sangria!! It’s delicious!! 5 stars well earned! :)
Not good food
good spot  for a party

Just left this place and can’t wait to share my experience. The best part was the service (and the food). The second my friend and I walked in, we were treated like royalty. Our server was on top of it the entire time. The manager was also there and really took care of us. Food was as good as the service, Thank you for making our night special. We’ll definitely go back,
Nice

went there for the first time for a bday party had a good night the owner is one funny dude had us laughing...he was very involved with our group... good place to have dinner drinks and a bit of dancing
Food was divine!
We went there 11 people on Mother's day and it was the worst dining experience I've ever had. The food and service were horrible.

Very disappointing experience . They only had a pre fix menu since it was mother's day. The selections were not of a wide variety.  The serivice was not existent.  The protion size was tiny for appetizer.  The crab cake was a size of a quarter.   Main course was decent portion but it was obviously prepared hours earlier and the side vegetables were cold.   Dessert was very tasty however again the portion was a half of a cheesecake.  In summary got overpriced meal with horrible service and half portion appetizer and dessert.
Didnt eat there. Atmosphere was good. The owner was so kind and introduced himself to all his guests. Would go back to try the food

Took my wife for our anniversary, I wasn't impressed. Had decided to give it one more try after they moved to New location. The maitre de was very nice, the price wasn't that bad, but food could have been better. Wish I had a better review.

Don't waste your time here. Good food bad management. The waiters look scared of there boss. We was dining in and then was gonna join the dance area when the owner or manager there closed the wall. We couldn't hear the music and was cut off from the other side/view. Felt unwelcomed and my family felt the same way.

We had a party in this restaurant unfortunately I can say was a big disaster, ..... disorganized they put the tables  too close together you couldn’t get up , no one could pass between the tables people had to get up in order to let someone pass ....the waiters had a problem with putting food on the table it was not enough food on the table the food was not that good ,  there was supposed to be  A bottle of wine on table  but it was messing ...i and we kept asking for the wine , we swait about an hour to get A glass of wine.... would never recommend this restaurant to have any type of a party or  Family gathering ..... The manager and the waiters we’re not pleasant all helpful   When we complained .....
Awesome
The food was WAYYY to expensive and It tasted average.
Beautiful service
(Translated by Google) Excellent!!!  (Original) Excelente!!!
Excellent food and atmosphere!! Service was great. Looking forward to eating here again.
Nice place for Good old music
Great atmosphere. good dj.  food wasnt tasty
this place was very mediocre and had trouble getting around but in all the service is amazing tireice was a great bartender and hope to see her again
Excellent Service! Anthony goes out of his way to make sure everything is taken care of.

I had the greatest service in my life.  This lady Ziggy gave me and my boyfriend the most outstanding service.  She was very polite cordial and not intruding.  Her product knowledge is amazing.  I give her and the restaurant 5 star.  Ziggy is definitely an asset to the Pearl Room.  And the Pearl Room has the best French braised chicken. I love it.
Stopped in for brunch on Saturday. Food was awesome and the great atmosphere was only enhanced by our host and waitress Ziggy. I'm so glad we went!

More like ZERO stars. The best thing this restaurant can do is close. My sister went to this restaurant tonight for valentine's day. She waited an exaggerated amount of time to get seated and served. But that's not even HALF of it. When she finally got her food, she started eating and felt something that was NOT food in her plate. When she takes it out, it was metal, little parts of metal were IN her food. What type incompetence level do you need to have to get metal scrap inside your customers food. And then the waiter had the AUDACITY TO SAY "I'LL GIVE YOU $20 OFF" Absolutely not. Insult to injury? Do NOT go to this restaurant unless you want to come on here and write about how you coughed up a cockroach or something.

I celebrated my Best Friends Birthday here with some family and friends party of 8. Had a reservation at 9Pm We came late they were very accommodating. The service was awesome everyone enjoyed there meals, Most of us had Stake, best I’ve ever had so fresh and tender. I also got to taste some of the other dishes the chicken parmigiana, on point, crispy and so far from dry it was perfect, The Penne Al vodka with shrimp was flavorful. It was a new experience for my group and we definitely enjoy ourselves. No one bothered my friend who was just up and about dancing alone while we waited for our food, lmao. There was a DJ there mixing some old school joints we all sang along too. Ended the night with dessert & coffee which was just what we needed to boost our energy  for the after party. Shout out to the manager Iggy had some confusion with my bill, she was so patient and explained everything to me in detail. The staff at The Pearl Room is definitely doing its thing keep up the hard work. Highly recommended. The Puerto Rican’s will be coming back.
Very nice place,good people good atmosphere
Went here for a engagement party. The food was great and so was the staff. I highly recommend this place for small parties.
Always great and food and service. Our compliments to the entire staff and chef.
Disappointed! Food was ok ...service terrible.
Had a great hangover brunch today .

It's a hip, bougie bar/restaurant with a nice modern vibe and all attractive interiors. The service has always been good, nothing to complain about there.  The caesar salad is surprisingly really, really tasty. I like my dressing to be made with real anchovy's, and this one does a good job of not tasting overly fishy but not tasting like Kraft dressing, either.
Had a great time there yesterday ,loved the stuffed chicken breast, one of the best i ever had
Great place to enjoy a drink . Thanks mike
Awesome atmosphere,  exquisite cuisine and it was incredibly entertaining to spend time with the Chef! 😀🎄🍭
This place has improved significantly since i came here 2 years ago . Good luck
Friendly fun great food
Great food. Yummy sangria. Nice atmosphere & decor. You can tell the owner & chef care for their customers.  Pleasant experience..would def go again & highly recommend!
Excellent private room in the back. Very updated and  cozy atmosphere.
Great hangout spot
So far, so good!
The food is excellent. The wait is a little long.
Tons of little flys and nats having dinner also.
Had a great time there. The Pearl room has a bar, restaurant, and dancing area. It was very clean and the workers are very friendly.
Great place great food great owner would definitely recommend it to anybody I know
Good Salads/pastas.
Nice place
I came with a party of about 12 and absolutely loved it. Great service, all the waiters were extremely helpful and patient, and the food was delicious. Definitely coming back!!

Went for a date, was immediately greeted at the door with a handshake, very respectful and courteous, the kind of thing you never see anymore. The service was great and it was not busy at the time. We got the steak and the salmon and both hit the spot. The atmosphere was chilled, music playing but not too loud, we enjoyed good convo. Portions are good and the price is normal. Looking forward to another visit
Excellent

The  staff was very rude,,The food took a hour and was cold. The owner introduced  himself as Anthony and was very speedy and clueless. .My daughter and friends went there and the owner was very sexual  with the young ladies and offered them cocain towards the end of the night.  I observed the place and found out that the owner is a womanizer and on narcotics...Not a place I would recommend. .

Michael, Michael, Michael. The best Chef and gentleman in Bay Ridge. It's all about class and what can you say Chef Michael has it and shows it in everything cooked here right into the atmosphere !  A wonderful happy place. Go see ... you will love it! Ellen Cavaliere-G
Anthony is the best!
I did my daughters baptism a month ago and the service was great they attend to all my guest and where very lovely to all.
Best fried ice-cream
Went here 11-09-16.we ordered drinks and there was a raoch in one of the drinks.good thing we didn't order our food yet. Very nasty.saty away from this place.it might look good but they are nasty.

Do you like loud music? I mean, really loud music? If you hate speaking with the people you are with, this is the place for you. Make sure you try the chicken. Especially if you don't really care about eating yummy food.
Great for dinner, great for parties and a great bar.

I must say the food was wonderful, Anthony the owner was super nice when I went there which was yesterday the ambient was so relaxing, and very cozy his staff was very attentive. I have nothing to complain about.
Nice bar

I went here for mothers day   It was very busy which is expected . We were seated after 20 minutes in a beautiful booth. Our food took a while to come out but it was well worth the wait. I dont understand how there are bad reviews about the pearl room because mothers day is the busiest day of the year. To me a busy place is a good place to be. The staff is always very friendly and accommodating. I ordered the beef wellington which melted in my mouth. my husband ordered the bacon chicken which was to die for   I actually ended up eating some from his dish lol. We then ordered chocolate truffles for dessert which we always get because there truffles are amazing. The owner came at our table towards the end of our meal to make sure that  we were completely satisfied. I give this restaurant 5 stars for being able to serve the most delicious food on the busiest day of the year!!

The good is pretty good BUT...  We were a party of three but the restaurant was almost entirely very large parties.   There were 6 tables of 5-15, and an equal number of small tables.  Not a place to go for a date or intimate dinner with friends.  We were expecting more of a fine dining experience,  this was like being in the middle of a wedding. .  It was noisy and servers and waiters were rushing around,  bumping into us.   We were seated then asked to move to make room for a large party.   Service was slow and inattentive.   When we ran out of white wine,  a server brought us a bottle and told us he put it in the bucket to chill for s bit because it was not quite cold.   Side dishes were not ready before we finished dinner so we cancelled them.  We couldn't wait to get our check and get out of there.

So I must start with the staff they are the most welcoming staff I have ever in countered..the food is by far the best in bayridge Anthony makes your food as if it was in your own home welcoming and satisfying. Beyond words he also greets all of his costumers with a great smile and friendliness to him I must say it make me and my friends and family happy to come each week..

Recently moved to new location a few blocks away from the original.  Relatively upscale for the neighborhood.  Still very good food, good service, reasonable prices on the entrees.  Clean.  A little noisy,perhaps.  The seafood paella was excellent.  Good for special occasions.

We had a wonderful ladies luncheon with family & friends. The staff and environment was  inviting and relaxing. The decor was beautiful and the food was AMAZING!!! Everyone enjoyed the food and decor! I would definitely recommend this elegant venue!!

I had my wedding there and I cannot express enough how disappointed my now husband and I were. The staff were pleasant but we got nothing we were promised by the owner himself. The set up was NOT what we had discussed and the food was served super late. We did not get our first dance because the music set up was horrible nor did we get to even cut our cake because the main course was not serviced till after 10pm in which guests were already leaving. I had to tell them to take the cake and just cut it. The ONLY good thing I can say about this place is that the room available to rent is beautiful. That's it. I will NOT recommend this place if you are an organized individual who wants to have a nice wedding reception dinner (food was just okay). They were NOT ready/prepared for a larger group. I look back on this day with so much regret and disappointment It makes me want to cry. One advise I can give anyone who is thinking of having their wedding dinner here is to RUN!
Awesome place. Food and service was great
Top of the line.great food and excellent service. Definitely going back.
Food is great, service excellent. Overall vibe is awesome.
Ordered and have been waiting an hour and 15 minutes :((
i love the food. it great place for wedding. the service is wonderful

I was there for a baby shower lunch and while the food was decent the room was freezing cold.  We told the staff that the room was cold and they told us that their thermostat was at 84 degrees.  I do know from a few several past experiences that this restaurant does not like to keep their place warm.  It is always cold when I go in there.  Despite being a classy nicely decorated restaurant, management is going to have to fix their heating system or I won't be back.  The food is not that good to sit in the cold.  It makes the food cool down even faster.
Food okay, but overpriced.  Management and service a joke. Atmosphere not very relaxing

The scene on a Saturday night for their DJ bar was a disaster. I didn't even get my coat off and the bartender was in my face to order a drink. It was a mistake to stay. Giving them the benefit of the night I had a red wine. The bottle was not refrigerated and my $9 glass tasted sour and warm. There was about 7 patrons and 7 staff. The bartender hounded my friend to get another beer but we were not staying. By 1am the DJ told her he was packing it up. The DJ music was loud with to much annoying electric sounding howling of his name. The person who recommended the place is bad. Should have read the poor reviews here.
The service was below average. The food was not that great either.

Made the mistake of going their for dinner on Christmas 2013.  If you like mediocre,  luke warm food and terrible service then this is the place for you.  If not, then run, and look for a better place in  Bay Ridge, There are so  many other resteurants to choose from. Our mistake was that we didn't take the reviews seriously.  It cost us over $100 but it was a lesson learned.  BTW-one of the appetizers listed Maryland Style Crab Cakes. (plural)  When the dish came out, there was one lonesome crabcake the size of a half dollar.  When asked why only one, when the menu alluded to more,  the reply was that's  the way it is. Be smart, stay away!
This place has great atmosphere & fantastic staff.  A pleasantly classy spot in bayridge.
Good food and Atmosphere.
Thank You Anthony and your staff!!!! U making customers happy and privileged! Thank you Dana for wonderful service and attention! Very clean place and excellent food.
Excellent! An amazing find in this area. Great ambience and fantastic food and service. A romantic place with candles and fireplace too.

Good food and good atmosphere for a clean and friendly Brooklyn restaurant that does not skimp out on anything!  I went for drinks and restaurant week and have no beef with them! Check it out if you are in the hood!
great seafood and solid service - worth taking a date
great for special events too.
pretty place and varied menu, mostly meditteranean. very good food and attentive service.
